title: Chase Freedom Grocery Cashback
body: 5% cashback on quarterly grocery categories (up to $1,500). Use this card for groceries.

title: Amex Gold Dining / Supermarket
body: 4x points at restaurants and U.S. supermarkets. Shift dining + grocery spend here.

title: Emergency Fund Strategy
body: Target 3-6 months of expenses. Auto-transfer $300/month to high-yield savings before discretionary spend.
